doc.field: Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello

This series contains published books and published and unpublished articles written and edited by George Bugliarello as well as his handwritten notes and research material he used for various publications. Subseries f: Books contains autographed copies of books by other authors addressed to George Bugliarello and Gioia Marconi Braga, daughter of Guglielmo Marconi, founder of the Marconi International Fellowship Foundation.

The publications have been assigned a number based on a numbering system adopted by the President's office to keep track of publications. Please see Box 42 / Folder 1 "List of Publications" for a complete list of George Bugliarello's publications compiled in October 2011.
Administrative Papers of the President George Bugliarello
